text: This is the year-to-year membership and makeup of the Continental Basketball League, including league divisional alignment and the circumstances of teams no longer in the league. ==Alignments== ===2010=== {| class=wikitable ! Continental Basketball League |- | Birmingham Steel/ Birmingham Sabers |- | Carolina Cougarz |- | Georgia Gwizzlies |- | Savannah Wildcats |- | Wilmington Sea Dawgs |} ===2011=== {| class=wikitable ! North Division!!South Division!!Travel!!Inactive |- | Birmingham Sabers || Florida Flight || Miami Stars || Savannah Wildcats |- | Cary Invasion || Gainesville Galaxy || Palm Beach Titans || |- | Fayetteville Crossover || Heartland Prowl || || |- | Wilmington Sea Dawgs || Port City Sharks* || || |} * Folded mid- season ==Defunct teams/failed expansion== *Carolina Cougarz *Port City Sharks ==Teams that left the CBL for another league== * Birmingham Steel - joined World Basketball Association, folded * Cary Invasion - joined Tobacco Road Basketball League * Fayetteville Crossover - joined Tobacco Road Basketball League * Florida Flight - joined Florida Basketball Association * Georgia Gwizzlies - rejoined the American Basketball Association after being removed from the league * Miami Stars - joined Florida Basketball Association * Palm Beach Titans - joined Florida Basketball Association * Wilmington Sea Dawgs - joined Tobacco Road Basketball League ==Timeline== DateFormat = mm/dd/yyyy ImageSize = width:800 height:auto barincrement:20 Period = from:01/01/2010 till:01/31/2012 TimeAxis = orientation:horizontal PlotArea = right:30 left:0 bottom:50 top:5 Colors = id:barcolor value:rgb(1,1,0) id:line value:black id:bg value:white PlotData= width:15 textcolor:black shift:(5,-5) anchor:from fontsize:s bar:1 color:barcolor from:05/01/2010 till:05/11/2010 text: Birmingham Steel (2010) bar:2 color:barcolor from:05/01/2010 till:03/28/2011 text:Carolina Cougarz (2010-2011) bar:3 color:barcolor from:05/01/2010 till:06/01/2010 text:Georgia Gwizzlies (2010) bar:4 color:barcolor from:05/01/2010 till:end text:Savannah Wildcats (2010-Present) bar:5 color:barcolor from:05/01/2010 till:11/18/2011 text:Wilmington Sea Dawgs (2010-2011) bar:6 color:barcolor from:05/11/2010 till:end text:Birmingham Sabers (2010-Present) bar:7 color:barcolor from:07/28/2010 till:01/11/2012 text:Florida Flight (2010-2011) bar:8 color:barcolor from:09/23/2010 till:01/11/2012 text:Miami Stars (2010-2011) bar:9 color:barcolor from:09/23/2010 till:01/11/2012 text:Palm Beach Titans (2010-2011) bar:10 color:barcolor from:03/28/2011 till:end text:Heartland Prowl (2011-Present) bar:11 color:barcolor from:04/11/2011 till:end text:Gainesville Galaxy (2011-Present) bar:12 color:barcolor from:04/13/2011 till:11/18/2011 text:Cary Invasion (2011) bar:13 color:barcolor from:04/14/2011 till:11/18/2011 text:Fayetteville Crossover (2011) bar:14 color:barcolor from:05/06/2011 till:05/27/2011 text:Port City Sharks (2011 ScaleMajor = gridcolor:line unit:year increment:1 start:01/01/2010 ==References== Category:Continental Basketball League
